title: Variety Fashion Article Classification
description: Classification of Variety magazine articles for fashion relevance to Editorialist

url.description: The URL of the original article

publication.description: The name of the publication that wrote the article (e.g., 'Variety', 'The Hollywood Reporter', etc.)

content_name.description: The name of the movie, TV show, or other content being discussed in the article

content_type.description: The type of content (e.g., 'movie', 'tv show', 'documentary', 'reality show', 'live event', 'miniseries', etc.)

is_fashion_related.description: Whether the movie/TV content is fashion-related (fashion central to plot, characters work in fashion and it's central, fashion documentaries, fashion reality shows)

confidence_score.description: Confidence score from 0-100 indicating how certain the classification is

relevance_summary.description: Brief explanation of why this content is or isn't relevant to Editorialist's fashion focus. Include specific details about fashion elements, designers, fashion icons, or plot relevance.

fashion_elements.description: List of specific fashion elements mentioned (brands, designers, fashion icons, fashion events, etc.)
